thread.title: Watch Ice Cube Hilariously Quiz Tracy Morgan and Charlie Day on Hip Hop
thread.title_full: Watch Ice Cube Hilariously Quiz Tracy Morgan and Charlie Day on Hip Hop

author: Kyle Hodge
title: Watch Ice Cube Hilariously Quiz Tracy Morgan and Charlie Day on Hip Hop
text:
Watch Ice Cube Hilariously Quiz Tracy Morgan and Charlie Day on Hip Hop See who's the hip hop guru in the video below. by Kyle Hodge 3h ago 
Get ready for the fight of the century, and the must-see comedy of the year. Fist Fight , starring Ice Cube and Charlie Day is finally here, but before the stars of the film gear up for opening night, Cube wants to test their hip hop knowledge. In a game of Hip-Hop Card Revoked, the executive producer of VH1’s upcoming Hip Hop Squares asks Day and co-star Tracy Morgan a few rap-based questions like “What’s rule #4 of the 10 Crack Commandments?” and “If it’s 2 in the morning and the party’s still jumping, what time does everyone leave?” to see how down with hip hop they really are. 
Check the hilarious video below and see who got to keep their hip hop card.
